    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandService

        public CommandService(java.io.BufferedReader in,
                      java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Create a new ComamndService. It will run on the provided streams. The service will start immediately after creation - no start method needs to be called. The delay between checks for readable data will be set to a reasonable default.
        Parameters:
        in - A stream from which commands will be read from
        out - A stream to which responses will be written

      • CommandService

        public CommandService(int pollDelay,
                      java.io.BufferedReader in,
                      java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Create a new ComamndService. It will run on the provided streams. The service will start immediately after creation - no start method needs to be called
        Parameters:
        pollDelay - The amount of time between checks for readable data on in
        in - A stream from which commands will be read from
        out - A stream to which responses will be written

    • Method Detail

      • getShutdownHook

        public ShutdownHook getShutdownHook()
                             throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Obtain the ShutdownHook for this CommandService. It will stop the service, so no more commands will be accepted. The hook is created during construction, so a NPE should not be a concern. Still, it's a possibility.
        Specified by:
        getShutdownHook in interface ShutdownService
        Returns:
        The ShutdownHook capable of stopping this CommandService
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the hook has not yet been created
